data.title: NNKCDE: Nearest Neighbor Kernel Conditional Density Estimation
data.name: NNKCDE
data.description: Nearest Neighbor Kernel Conditional Density Estimation

evidence: "NNKCDE: Nearest Neighbor Conditional Density Estimation" and "Estimates nearest neighbor kernel conditional densities tuned using CDE loss." indicate a concrete analysis/estimation tool rather than a generic library description.
The README only provides a citation and no installation or packaging instructions (no mention of PyPI, CRAN, containers, or binaries), implying use directly from the source repository.

The citations describe methodological research ("Conditional density estimation tools in python and R with applications to photometric redshifts and likelihood-free cosmological inference"), indicating the code directly implements research methods for scientific inference.
